name: ez
description: Customized npm script used as a slim front-end web development tool task runner comparable with Gulp or Grunt.

scripts.build:css: node-sass --output-style compressed src/scss/styles.scss -o dest/assets/css/ && npm run autoprefixer
scripts.build: npm run build:html && npm run build:css && npm run build:js
scripts.watch: npm run watch:html & npm run watch:js & npm run watch:css
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run watch

author: Frieder Jan Moerman @hardcodepunk
